dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset containing CG images of various scenes rendered from camera positions placed on a hemispherical surface, used for evaluating novel view synthesis.
dcterms:title: NeRF synthetic dataset

dcterms:description: A specific scene from the NeRF synthetic dataset featuring Lego objects, used for evaluating camera localization performance.

dcterms:description: A dataset containing scenes with smoke subjects, used for evaluating the performance of the proposed method in handling translucent objects.
dcterms:title: Smoke-subject scene dataset
